name: Spirit of Wind
effect: b'On Enter: Draw seven cards.'
flavor_text: b'Turbulent zephyrs swirl around the soul, inspiring fleet-footed dreams and expedited efficiency.'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes Starter Decks 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'

name: Tristan, Underhanded
effect: b'On Enter: You may put a preparation counter on Tristan. If you don\xe2\x80\x99t, you gain agility 3 for this turn. (Agility 3 \xe2\x80\x94 Return three cards from your memory to your hand at the beginning of the end phase.)'
flavor_text: b'\xe2\x80\x9cConsider it done. Just worry about my payment.\xe2\x80\x9d'

name: Tristan, Hired Blade
effect: b'Tristan Lineage\nOn Enter: If Tristan has two or more preparation counters on her, draw a card. Then if Tristan has four or more preparation counters on her, draw an additional card.'

name: Tristan, Shadowdancer
effect: b'Tristan Lineage\nOn Enter: Summon two Ominous Shadow tokens and put a preparation counter on Tristan.\nRemove two preparation counters from Tristan: Change the target of an attack that targets Tristan to a phantasia ally you control.'

name: Assassin's Mantle
effect: b"If your champion would take damage, you may banish Assassin's Mantle. If you do, prevent 1 of that damage. Put a preparation counter on your champion if damage was prevented this way.
flavor_text: b'A good assassin is never seen without a means to veil their presence, but a masterful assassin is never seen.'

name: Curved Dagger
effect: b"[Class Bonus] As long as your champion is attacking an ally, Curved Dagger gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor_text: b'Its curved edge is perfect for slicing through the flesh of both man and monster.'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 2 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 2 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'

name: Life Essence Amulet
effect: b"Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: b'"It is said a great alchemist made this amulet for his lover should she be at death\'s door."\r\n\xe2\x80\x94 Gildas, Chronicler of Aesa'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes Starter Decks 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Alchemical Revolution Starter Decks 2 b'Deeya Chaturvedi'

name: Poisoned Dagger
effect: b'Poisoned Dagger enters the field rested.\r\nREST, Banish Poisoned Dagger: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Class Bonus: Until end of turn, if that unit were to take damage, it takes that much damage plus 1 instead.'
flavor_text: b'A little poison goes a long way.'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 2 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 2 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'

name: Gearstride Gloves
effect: b'On Enter: Put a preparation counter on your champion.\n[Class Bonus] [Level 2+] Banish Gearstride Gloves: The next Reaction card you activate this turn costs 1 less to activate.'
flavor_text: b"A fusion of gears and gust in one's palm.

name: Dusksoul Stone
effect:
b"As an additional cost to materialize this card, banish two ally cards from a single graveyard.
Phantasias you control have spellshroud. (Objects with spellshroud can't be targeted by Spells.)
Banish Dusksoul Stone: Banish up to two cards from a single graveyard.

name: Malignant Athame
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Champion Hit: You may have that opponent swap the cards in their hand and memory. Then if there are four or more cards in their memory, deal 2 unpreventable damage to the hit champion.'
flavor_text: b'Weapons can be used for more than just killing.'

name: Shadeblood Coating
effect: b'Banish Shadeblood Coating: Up to three target units you control gain "On Hit: Put a preparation counter on your champion" until end of turn.'
flavor_text: b'This ominous oil ravenously drinks in blood to sharpen the next strike.'

name: Exploit Vulnerability
effect: b'Prepare 1 (You may remove a preparation counter from your champion as you activate this card.)\nDraw a card. Then if Exploit Vulnerability was prepared, choose an Assassin unit you control and it gains "On Ally Hit: Destroy the hit ally" until end of turn.'

name: Idle Thoughts
effect: b'Look at the top four cards of your deck and then put them back in any order.\r\nFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes Starter Decks 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'

name: Incapacitate
effect: b"[Class Bonus] This card costs 2 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)\nNegate target action card activation.
flavor_text: b"It's not about who strikes first, it's about who wins.

name: Mastermind Scheme
effect: b"[Class Bonus] Efficiency (This card costs LV less to activate. LV refers to your champion's level.)\nDouble the amount of preparation counters on your champion. Then if there are eight or more preparation counters on your champion, you gain agility 3 for this turn.

name: Sable Remnant
effect: b'[Class Bonus] Sable Remnant gets +1 power.\nFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.) '

name: Slice and Dice
effect: b"Prepare 3\nOn Hit: If Slice and Dice was prepared, you may have the attacker declare an additional attack. If you do, create a copy of Slice and Dice in that attacker's intent except it isn't prepared and it gets +3 power.

name: Thieving Cut
effect: b'Prepare 1 (You may remove a preparation counter from your champion as you activate this card.)\nOn Hit: If Thieving Cut was prepared, draw a card.'

name: Arrow Trap
effect: b"Prepare 1 (You may remove a preparation counter from your champion as you activate this card.)\r\nReturn target attacking ally to its owner's hand. Class Bonus: If Arrow Trap was prepared, destroy that ally instead.
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 2 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 2 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'

name: Betraying Blade
effect: b'On Attack: You may pay (2. If you do, put a preparation counter on your champion.\n[Class Bonus] Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.) '

name: Cloaked Executioner
effect: b'[Class Bonus] Fast Activation (You may activate this card at fast speed.)\nAmbush (This ally may retaliate against attackers while not defending.)'

name: Shimmercloak Assassin
effect: b"Stealth (This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.)
flavor_text: b'"I need an Auto-Maid, but make it keep out of sight somehow. They are an eyesore for my guests."\n\xe2\x80\x94 Custom Dorumegian Noble Commission'

name: Sirocco Operative
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Enter: Draw a card into your memory.\nOn Enter: If you control another Automaton ally, put a preparation counter on your champion.'
flavor_text: b'Efficient and discreet, these automatons leave no more trace than a gentle gust of wind.'

name: Stifling Trap
effect: b"[Class Bonus] If it's not your turn, you may remove two preparation counters from your champion to activate this card from your memory without paying its reserve cost.\nDeal 2 damage to target ally, then negate all on enter triggers from that ally.

name: Surveil the Winds
effect: b'[Class Bonus] Fast Activation (You may activate this card at fast speed.)\nDraw a card, then put a preparation counter on your champion.'
flavor_text: b'The winds tell more than just which direction it blows.'

name: Gloamspire Headhunter
effect: b"Stealth (This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.)\n[Class Bonus] On Ally Hit: Destroy the hit ally unless its controller pays 2.

name: Grim Foreboding
effect: b'[Tristan Bonus] Summon an Ominous Shadow token.\nPhantasia allies you control get +1 power until end of turn. You gain agility 3 for this turn.'
flavor_text: b"It is unwise to underestimate a clone, for a shadow is as powerful as its owner's will.

name: Haunting Demise
effect: b"[Class Bonus] On Champion Hit: Put Haunting Demise on the bottom of the hit champion's lineage.\nInherited Effect: At the beginning of your recollection phase, deal 1 unpreventable damage to this object.

name: Ominous Shadow
effect: b'Unblockable (This unit\xe2\x80\x99s attacks can\xe2\x80\x99t be intercepted and ignores taunt.)\nIf damage would be dealt to Ominous Shadow, prevent 3 of that damage.\nOminous Shadow may only declare attacks against units your champion has dealt combat damage to this turn.'

name: Shadow Resonance
effect: b'Recover 2, then draw a card. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)\n[Tristan Bonus] If your champion has four or more preparation counters on them, summon an Ominous Shadow token.'

name: Shadowstrike
effect: b"Prepare X. can't be 0.\nShadowstrike gets +X power.\n[Class Bonus] If Shadowstrike was prepared, it has unblockable. (An attack with [unblockable] can't be intercepted and ignores [taunt] .)

name: Shifting Mirage
effect: b'[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate.\nYour champion gains stealth until end of turn unless an opponent pays 2.\n[Tristan Bonus] Summon an Ominous Shadow token.'
